description: Describes the data feed for Spot Instances. For more information, see Spot Instance data feed in the Amazon EC2 User Guide.

nested_items.name: SpotDatafeedSubscription
nested_items.description: The Spot Instance data feed subscription.

nested_items.name: Bucket
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon S3 bucket where the Spot Instance data feed is located.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The reason code for the Spot Instance state change.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: The message for the Spot Instance state change.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the account.

nested_items.name: Prefix
nested_items.description: The prefix for the data feed files.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the Spot Instance data feed subscription.
